title: Meta Plans to Cut 10% to 15% of Employees in Reality Labs Business
description: The layoffs are set to be announced this week and would affect Meta’s work on the metaverse, as the company spends heavily on building artificial intelligence.
content: Meta plans to cut around 10 percent of the employees in its Reality Labs division who work on products including the metaverse, according to three people with knowledge of the discussions, as the company shifts priorities to build next-generation art... [2142 chars]

title: AI pendants back in vogue at tech show after early setback
description: Pendants and brooches packed with artificial intelligence abounded at the recent Consumer Electronics show, using cameras and microphones to watch and listen through the day like a vigilant personal assistant. The return of the wearable tech comes about a year after the discontinuation of a Humane AI Pin panned by…
content:
Pendants and brooches packed with artificial intelligence abounded at the recent Consumer Electronics show, using cameras and microphones to watch and listen through the day like a vigilant personal assistant.

title: Apple Teams Up With Google for A.I. in Its Products
description: Apple was facing increasing questions about its plans for artificial intelligence as other big tech companies invested tens of billions in the technology.
content:
After a nearly yearlong delay to its efforts to compete in artificial intelligence, Apple said on Monday that it planned to base its A.I. products on technology developed by Google.
The upcoming versions of Apple Foundation Models — the company’s mod... [2067 chars]

title: New Sony patent hints at PS6 feature that changes the way you play games
description: PlayStation fans discover a new feature that uses artificial intelligence in a controversial way.
content:
Sony has filed an interesting new patent for technology that uses artificial intelligence to play your games for you.
The patent is for something Sony describes as 'Ghost Player', which is essentially an AI-generated version of the player character t... [1409 chars]
